resources.string: This app is developed mainly for education and learning purposes of android development. It is a simple app that shows information about movies and series. It utilizies API calls for data fetching, uses modern design technics like navigation drawer, floating action buttons, Snackbar, recyclerview, custom adapters, collapsing toolbar layouts, constraint layouts, custom fonts, pallete library, volley library, Picasso library... I am not responsible for any false data or posible damage that this app can do to your device in terms of data consumption or chrashes.
"This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb."
The custom font is made by Film Himmel - Jens R. Ziehn and it is available at http://www.1001freefonts.com/
